education.institution: University of Trs-os-Montes and Alto Douro
education.degree: Erasmus Exchange Student in Informatics Engineering

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Proficient in managing data across different cloud platforms, including AWS S3, GCS, and ABS.
Experienced with various API types, such as REST, gRPC, and GraphQL, for efficient communication and data retrieval.
Skilled in using Kubernetes and related utilities such as kubectl to automate workflows and create bash scripts.
Utilized Python libraries such as Pandas, Dask, and Scikit-learn for machine learning applications.
Collaborated with colleagues to solve complex issues using pair programming technique.

Contributed to the development and optimization of a machine learning platform API by refactoring code, implementing performance improvements, and enhancing functionality, resulting in a more efficient and effective overall system.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented multiple REST APIs using Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy, to efficiently store and retrieve data from databases.
Streamlined workflow by creating custom bash scripts, resulting in significant time savings and increased productivity.
Expanded and maintained a Laravel web interface for monitoring thousands of ONT devices.
Leveraged hybrid properties in SQLAlchemy to improve data processing and increase database performance.
Collected and stored data from network devices using Python through snmplib and easytelnet; to avoid conflicts between the devices, we integrated a redis worker to execute commands sequentially.
Utilized Docker extensively to improve software delivery cycles, achieving faster and more reliable deployments.

experience.title: Technical Support
description: Monitored network operations and documented events that impacted normal functionality, providing regular reports to management on network performance and issues.
Served as a Dispatch Agent, leading teams of network technicians in the field to quickly resolve network issues and minimize downtime.
Gained extensive experience in remote work with various network devices, including line enclosures, splitter enclosures, OLTs, and ONTs, among others.

skills.languages: Python, JavaScript, PHP, Bash, SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
skills.libraries: SQLAlchemy, Flask-RESTPlus, snmplib, easytelnet, Pandas, Dask, Sklearn, Marshmallow
